name: Cash Cow Bank
description:
I was asked to do a custom cow bank and I thought it was so cute I couldn't resist making more of them! The coin slot will accept coins at least as large as a quarter and the cork stopper in the nose is easily removable so you don't have to break your bank to get your stash.

Approximate dimensions:
Belly width: 4.25"
Snout to tail: 5.5"
Ground to horn tips: 5.25"

Stoneware, cone 6 oxidation fired and glazed.
Food safe, non-toxic and made to last.
Actual colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.
Due to the handcrafted nature of these pieces, there are slight imperfections in symmetry and glazing.

name: Moose Bank
description:
What's better than a piggy bank? A MOOSIE BANK!

The coin slot will accept coins at least as large as a quarter and the cork stopper in the nose is easily removeable so you don't have to break your bank to get your stash.

Belly width: 4.25"
Snout to tail: 5.5"
Ground to antlers: 5.25"

Stoneware, cone 6 oxidation fired and glazed.
Food safe, non-toxic and made to last.
Actual colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.
Due to the handcrafted nature of these pieces, there are slight imperfections in symmetry and glazing.

name: Pig-shaped Salt Pig
description:
This handy little piggy can be used to hold your salt on the counter so that you can just grab a pinch on the fly to add to your cuisine. It can also be used as an earring keeper, a soap holder, a coin repository, a sponge stasher, etc. If you've got a collection of little thingies that need a home, this will do the trick!

Approximate Dimensions:
ground to ear-tips - @ 5 inches
inside width of the opening - @ 3 to 3.5 inches

Stoneware, cone 6 oxidation fired and glazed.
Food safe, non-toxic and made to last.
Actual colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.
Due to the handcrafted nature of these pieces, there are slight imperfections in symmetry and glazing.

name: Cat-shaped Yarn Keeper
description:
Unlike most cats, this one will actually help you with your knitting projects!  Yarn keeper kitty is a great way to keep yarn balls from running all over the place, AND it's adorable to boot! To prevent him from scratching up your floor or furniture surfaces, the bottom of each foot has a felt pad secured to it. 

Approximate dimensions:
Width: 6"
Height: 5"

Stoneware, cone 6 oxidation fired and glazed.
Food safe, non-toxic and made to last.
Actual colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.
Due to the handcrafted nature of these pieces, there are slight imperfections in symmetry and glazing.

name: Cat disguised as a birdfeeder
description:
This kitty thinks he's especially smart and crafty - will a birdie come and perch on his tongue? You'll have to hang him up in your backyard to see!

This bird feeder is made from mid-range stoneware and constructed with outdoor wear-and-tear in mind. The "front paws" are close to the body and made to hold securely onto his rope. A small drainage hole is located in his belly to let out any rainwater that manages to find its way in.

Approximate dimensions:
Paw to Paw: 5"
Height: 6.5"
Tongue to Tail: 8"

Stoneware, cone 6 oxidation fired and glazed.
Food safe, non-toxic and made to last.
Actual colors may vary slightly from what is pictured.
Due to the handcrafted nature of these pieces, there are slight imperfections in symmetry and glazing.
